featured.text: Which of the following is the best title for this passage? (A) Totem Poles, the Legends of Aboriginal Peoples (B) Totem Poles: Their Functions (C) Totem Poles, Symbols of Historical Resistance (D) Totem Poles: Their Designs 46.
Welcome poles were traditionally placed on village beachfronts to greet visitors arriving by canoe.

definition.zh_def: 極，指地球的兩個極點或任何長杆狀物體的兩端。
definition.en_def: The ends of a magnet or the two points on the Earth's surface at the extremes of its axis.
definition.example: The North and South Poles are critical for understanding Earth's climate.
